entry.name: getRuntime
entry.short: Returns the associated Runtime.

entry.name: getVersionString
entry.short: Returns the berkelium host version e.g. “22.0.1229.94”

entry.name: getMajor
entry.short: Returns the Major Version, e.g. “22”

entry.name: getMinor
entry.short: Returns the Minor Version, always zero?

entry.name: getBuild
entry.short: Returns the Build Version, e.g. “1229”

entry.name: getPatch
entry.short: Returns the Patch Version, e.g. “94”

entry.name: isMinVersion
entry.short: Returns true if the given Version is less or equal to the version of the executable represented by this executable object.

entry.short: Creates an add additional Berkelium Runtime Instance with given LogDelegate.

entry.name: update
entry.short: Processes all Pending Events. Waits up to timeout ms for new events.

entry.short: Creates an HostExecutable Object representing the given executable.

entry.short: Creates an HostExecutable, the exectuable is searched through system path or system configuration (e.g. registry on windows)

group.name: Profile
group.short: Represents a berkelium profile on disk.

entry.name: getRuntime
entry.short: Returns the associated Runtime.

entry.name: isInUse
entry.short: Returns true if this profile is already in use.

entry.name: isFound
entry.short: Returns true if this profile was found on disk.

entry.name: isSameVersion
entry.short: Returns true if this profile can be used without updating this profile to a newer version.

entry.name: isTooNew
entry.short: Returns true if this profile is from a newer berkelium host version.

entry.name: getApplicationName
entry.short: Returns the name of the application or “berkelium” if not specified.

entry.name: getProfilePath
entry.short: Returns the full path to the used Profile.

entry.name: setLocked
entry.short: Lock or Unlock the Profile so another instance can't open it for writing.

entry.name: isLocked
entry.short: Returns true if this Profile instance holds the Profile lock.

group.name: HostDelegate
group.short: Handler for events concerning the berkelium host process.
HostAdapter is an abstract class with empty function definitions for all functions in HostDelegate.

entry.name: onCrashed
entry.short: Called if the host process was unexpected terminated.

entry.name: onClosed
entry.short: Called if the host process was properly closed.

group.name: Instance
group.short: Represents a running berkelium host instance.

entry.name: getRuntime
entry.short: Returns the associated Runtime.

entry.name: internalUpdate
entry.short: Internal Update Function

entry.name: close
entry.short: Closes all open Windows/Tabs and the profile, terminates the host.
Also removes the profile if it is a temporary one.

entry.name: getProfile
entry.short: Returns the profile used to launch this instance.

entry.name: getExecutable
entry.short: Returns the executable used to launch this instance.

entry.name: addHostDelegate
entry.short: Add the given HostDelegate to this Instance.

entry.name: removeHostDelegate
entry.short: Remove the given HostDelegate from this Instance.

entry.name: getWindowCount
entry.short: Returns the number of active Windows.

entry.name: getWindowList
entry.short: Returns a list of all active windows.
It is guaranteed that there is at least one window. If the last window is closed the host process will be closed.

entry.name: createWindow
entry.short: Open a new window.

entry.short: Returns the associated Runtime.

entry.name: internalUpdate
entry.short: Internal Update Function

entry.name: getTabCount
entry.short: Returns the current tab count.

entry.name: getTabList
entry.short: Returns an ordered list of all tabs in this window.

entry.name: createTab
entry.short: Creates a new (about:blank) Tab.

entry.name: getInstance
entry.short: Returns the Instance used to create this Window.

entry.name: moveTo
entry.short: Move this Tab to the given index.

entry.name: isIncognito
entry.short: Returns true if this is a incognito window.

entry.name: getRuntime
entry.short: Returns the associated Runtime.

entry.name: internalUpdate
entry.short: Internal Update Function

entry.name: close
entry.short: Closes this tab and removes it from the window.

entry.name: sync
entry.short: Wait until all pending Java Script Events are handled.

entry.name: getTabDelegate
entry.short: All methods called on this tab delegate are forwared to all tab delegates of this tab.

entry.name: addTabDelegate
entry.short: Add a TabDelegate to this tab.

entry.name: removeTabDelegate
entry.short: Remove a TabDelegate from this tab.

entry.name: getWindow
entry.short: Returns the Window of this Tab.

entry.name: resize
entry.short: Set the size of this tab.
A onResize() event is triggered on the tab delegate.

entry.name: navigateTo
entry.short: Set the URL of this tab. A new tab has the url “about:blank”.
This function should be called after all event listeners are registered.

group.name: TabDelegate
group.short: Handler for events concerning tab content.
TabAdapter is an abstract class with empty function definitions for all functions in TabDelegate.
